Home.title: Internationalization(i18n) in Next.js 14
Home.description:
Next.js 14 introduces enhanced internationalization (i18n) features, empowering developers to effortlessly manage translations, locale-based routing, and content localization for globally accessible web applications.

This also piggy-backs built-in support for multiple locales, dynamic content loading, and robust fallback handling.
